name: Where's Emoji?
description:
Love Emoji? Test your powers of observation it's not as easy as it looks to Find The Emoji.

The aim of Where's Emoji is to successfully find as many elusive emoji as you can. You've got 20 seconds to find a random emoji who is hiding. Each time you play everything is totally random and unique, what level can you get to?

• Randomly Generated Puzzles, different every time you play.
• Climb the leaderboards using your powers of observation.
• Spot the emoji in a sea of his friends.
